page.title: 09Leisure Activities
page.content: Although in our area there are not many facilities for organised leisure activities there are plenty of interesting and lovely walks. Many families ramble in Dydon Woods, Okeover Park,Cuckoo Cliff and Foxholes near Hanging Bridge is popular. The three pubs have a varity of games available,darts,snooker,dominoes and electronic games. One of the pubs,The Royal Oak, has a big Pop Quiz and the proceeds go to a good cause. This year two local schools were given almost four hundred pounds each. The Henry Prince First School Mayfield was one of these and a video machine was bought. Tug-of-War is a popular leisure activity. There is a successful team in our area called "Hanging Bridge". They train near The Royal Oak. There is a Pony Trekking Centre at Throstle's Nest Farm which is popular.
